languages.text: "Чтоб меня, Лорд-капитан, а я-то думал, что все пустотные хитрости знаю! Ну, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}вашему-то опыту{/d} и поклониться не стыдно. Торпеды, залп!" {n}Аккуратный и точный взрыв сотрясает бок "Бессердечного", в совершенстве исполняя ваш замысел.{/n}

"Blast my gut, Lord Cap'n, I thought I knew every trick in the book! Well, there's no shame in bowing to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}your experience in the void{/d}. Launch torpedo!" {n}A precisely calculated explosion shakes the side of the Heartless — your plan has been executed flawlessly.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich will verdammt sein, Lord Cap'n, und ich dachte, ich kenne wirklich alle Tricks! Nun, es ist keine Schande, das Haupt vor {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Eurer Erfahrung in der Leere{/d} zu beugen. Torpedo los!" {n}Eine präzise berechnete Explosion erschüttert eine Seite der Heartless – dein Plan wurde fehlerlos umgesetzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blast my gut, Lord Cap'n, I thought I knew every trick in the book! Well, there's no shame in bowing to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}your experience in the void{/d}. Launch torpedo!" {n}A precisely calculated explosion shakes the side of the Heartless — your plan has been executed flawlessly.{/n}

Nun, es ist keine Schande, das Haupt vor {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Eurer Erfahrung in der Leere{/d} zu beugen. Torpedo los!" {n}Eine präzise berechnete Explosion erschüttert eine Seite der Heartless – dein Plan wurde fehlerlos umgesetzt.{/n}

languages.text: « Eh beh, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Tous les moyens sont bons, à ce que je vois ! Après tout, vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}plus d'expérience avec le vide que moi{/d}. Torpille lancée ! » {n}Une explosion à la précision indéniable fait trembler le flanc du Sans-Cœur. Votre plan a marché à la perfection.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blast my gut, Lord Cap'n, I thought I knew every trick in the book! Well, there's no shame in bowing to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}your experience in the void{/d}. Launch torpedo!" {n}A precisely calculated explosion shakes the side of the Heartless — your plan has been executed flawlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Eh beh, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Tous les moyens sont bons, à ce que je vois ! Après tout, vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}plus d'expérience avec le vide que moi{/d}. Torpille lancée ! » {n}Une explosion à la précision indéniable fait trembler le flanc du Sans-Cœur. Votre plan a marché à la perfection.{/n}

languages.text: “哎，船长老大，我还以为我所有的招数都会了，但你真让我开眼了！不过，{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}你在太空的经验那么丰富{/d}，比不上你可不是什么丢人的事情。发射鱼雷！”{n}精确的爆炸破坏了无心号的侧翼，你的计划执行得完美无缺。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blast my gut, Lord Cap'n, I thought I knew every trick in the book! Well, there's no shame in bowing to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}your experience in the void{/d}. Launch torpedo!" {n}A precisely calculated explosion shakes the side of the Heartless — your plan has been executed flawlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “哎，船长老大，我还以为我所有的招数都会了，但你真让我开眼了！不过，{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}你在太空的经验那么丰富{/d}，比不上你可不是什么丢人的事情。发射鱼雷！”{n}精确的爆炸破坏了无心号的侧翼，你的计划执行得完美无缺。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Que me aspen, Lord Capi, y yo que pensaba que me conocía todos los trucos! Bueno, no es ninguna vergüenza que me supere en {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experiencia en el vacío{/d}. ¡Disparando torpedo!». {n}Una explosión bein calculada sacude el flanco de la Desalmada: tu plan se ha ejecutado a la perfección.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blast my gut, Lord Cap'n, I thought I knew every trick in the book! Well, there's no shame in bowing to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}your experience in the void{/d}. Launch torpedo!" {n}A precisely calculated explosion shakes the side of the Heartless — your plan has been executed flawlessly.{/n}

Bueno, no es ninguna vergüenza que me supere en {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experiencia en el vacío{/d}. ¡Disparando torpedo!». {n}Una explosión bein calculada sacude el flanco de la Desalmada: tu plan se ha ejecutado a la perfección.{/n}

languages.text: 「畜生め、キャプテン閣下、私はあらゆる手口を知っていると思っていました！まあ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ヴォイドでのあなたの経験{/d}には頭が下がります。魚雷発射！」{n}精密に計算された爆発がハートレスの側面を揺らす…あなたの計画は完璧に実行された。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blast my gut, Lord Cap'n, I thought I knew every trick in the book! Well, there's no shame in bowing to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}your experience in the void{/d}. Launch torpedo!" {n}A precisely calculated explosion shakes the side of the Heartless — your plan has been executed flawlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「畜生め、キャプテン閣下、私はあらゆる手口を知っていると思っていました！まあ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ヴォイドでのあなたの経験{/d}には頭が下がります。魚雷発射！」{n}精密に計算された爆発がハートレスの側面を揺らす…あなたの計画は完璧に実行された。{/n}

languages.text: "Ben de her numarayı biliyorum sanırdım Lord Kaptan! Ama {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}uçsuzda sizin tecrübenize{/d} şapka çıkarmak gerek. Torpidoyu ateşleyin!" {n}Taşkalp'in sancak tarafı, milimi milimine hesaplanmış bir patlamayla sarsılıyor. Planın kusursuzca işliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blast my gut, Lord Cap'n, I thought I knew every trick in the book! Well, there's no shame in bowing to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}your experience in the void{/d}. Launch torpedo!" {n}A precisely calculated explosion shakes the side of the Heartless — your plan has been executed flawlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben de her numarayı biliyorum sanırdım Kaptan'ım! Ama {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}uçsuzda sizin tecrübenize{/d} şapka çıkarmak gerek. Torpidoyu ateşleyin!" {n}Taşkalp'in sancak tarafı, milimi milimine hesaplanmış bir patlamayla sarsılıyor, planın kusursuzca işledi.{/n}
